Our Electrical Products

High-quality components for all your electrical needs

Circuit Protection

Circuit breakers, fuses, surge protectors, and safety switches designed to protect your electrical systems.

Wiring & Connectors

High-quality cables, connectors, terminals, and wiring accessories for reliable electrical connections.

Energy Solutions

Energy-efficient lighting, solar components, and power management systems to reduce consumption.

About RSH Electrical

Our journey in providing electrical excellence

  • 2005-2008

    Our Humble Beginnings

    RSH Electrical Products was founded by three electrical engineers with a vision to provide high-quality electrical components to the local market.

  • 2012

    Regional Expansion

    We expanded our operations to serve the entire region, opening three new distribution centers and increasing our product range.

  • 2018

    Embracing Green Energy

    Recognizing the shift towards sustainable energy, we launched our green energy product line specializing in solar components.

  • 2023

    Digital Transformation

    We launched our online platform and member portal, making it easier for clients to access products and technical support.

  • Be Part
    Of Our
    Story!

18+ Years Experience
1200+ Products
350+ Clients Served
24/7 Technical Support
